resources.string: User account is not mandatory, but if you want to create one go to weeb.tv site or tap \"Create\" button. If not - just tap \"Launch XMTV\".

A place where you can find a Polish TV!
Popular channels, live, 24 on the screen of your phone.
The easy way to television. Just phone and watch for free right now!


www.weeb.tv

WeebTV is add-on for XMTV Player.

If you have existing account on weeb.tv enter your account data in add-on.
To use WeebTV add-on start XMTV Player, navigate to plugins section and you should see it listed there.

A place where you can find a Polish TV! Popular channels, live, 24 on the screen of your phone. The easy way to television. Just phone and watch for free right now!
WEEB TV
